newsitem.title: USA: Weekend U.S. box office chart -- Oct 25-27.
newsitem.headline: Weekend U.S. box office chart -- Oct 25-27.

text.p: Following are the final data for the top 10 movies at the October 25-27 U.S. box office, according to Exhibitor Relations Co.

NOTE: "Sleepers" and "Michael Collins" are released by Time Warner Inc.'s Warner Bros. "High School High" is released by Sony Corp's TriStar Pictures. "Stephen King's Thinner", "The First Wives Club" and "The Ghost and the Darkness" are released by Paramount Pictures, a unit of Viacom Inc..

"The Associate" and "D3: The Mighty Ducks" are released by Walt Disney Co. "The Long Kiss Goodnight" is released by New Line Cinema, a unit of Time Warner's Turner Broadcasting System. "That Thing You Do!" is released by News Corp.'s 20th Century Fox.
